CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( SOPs__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( SOPs__c, "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( First_Touch_SLA__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( First_Touch_SLA__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Refrained_From_Using_Jargon__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Refrained_From_Using_Jargon__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Refrained_From_Internal_Team_References__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Refrained_From_Internal_Team_References__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Language__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Language__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Grammar__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Grammar__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Issue_Resolved__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Issue_Resolved__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Closure_SLA__c , "Yes"),ISPICKVAL( Closure_SLA__c , "N/A")),0.125,0)
CustomField.label: Operations QA Score
